title: Make Us One

lyrics.text:
Make us one, Lord, make us one; Holy Spirit, make us one. Let your love flow so the world will know we are one in you.
Make us one, Lord, make us one; Holy Spirit, make us one. Let your love flow so the world will know we are one in you.

author: Carol Cymbala
